name: Gutterbones
text:
Gutterbones enters the battlefield tapped.
{1}{B}: Return Gutterbones from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your turn and only if an opponent lost life this turn.

rulings.text: Damage dealt to a player causes that player to lose that much life.
In a multiplayer game, if an opponent loses life during your turn and then leaves the game, you can activate Gutterbones’s ability.
